scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "Frontend:3001","Backend:3002" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev -w apps/web" "npm run dev -w apps/api"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w apps/api
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n "Frontend:3001","Backend:3002" -c "blue,green" "npm run start -w apps/web" "npm run start -w apps/api"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w apps/web && npm install -w apps/api
